name: JIAYI QIU
intro_content: I am an inspired data journalist based in the Bay Area, USA. I use maps and data visualizations to cover a range of topics in technology, finance, politics, and social justice.
Previously, I worked as a data scientist in web3 fraud detection.
Prior to that, I graduated from the University of California, Berkeley, with a Bachelor's Degree, double majoring in Economics and Data Science.
